name: YARUB ADNAN
title: Full Stack Developer & Cybersecurity Specialist
summary: Full Stack developer and cybersecurity enthusiast based in Nyköping, Sweden. I strive to improve user experiences and apply advanced security techniques. I care about innovation and development in every project through elegant code and strong security measures. As a passionate person, I constantly seek new challenges and opportunities for growth. Out of the world Technology, I find calm and inspiration in the melody of music.

experience.description: Designs, develops, and maintains secure and scalable web applications while prioritizing user experience. Proficient in hardware maintenance and troubleshooting. Implements innovative cybersecurity solutions to safeguard systems and data integrity.
Supported cadastral mapping and land surveying projects, enhancing skills in data analysis and project management.
Led civil engineering projects from conception to completion, ensuring precision and quality throughout.
Focused on land surveying for infrastructure projects, facilitating successful project execution through meticulous planning and analysis.
